Bash(./venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''backend/pulseboard.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()
cursor.execute(''SELECT id, name, type, enabled FROM feeddefinition'')
for row in cursor.fetchall():
    print(f''{row[0][:8]}... | {row[1]:20} | {row[2]:15} | enabled={row[3]}'')
conn.close()
")
